ITEM 13. CERTAIN RELATIONSHIPS AND RELATED TRANSACTIONS, AND DIRECTOR INDEPENDENCE

EXECUTIVE OFFICERS AND DIRECTORS

Jeffrey P. Bezos founded Amazon.com in 1994 and has been our President, Chief Executive Officer, and Chairman of the Board since May 1996.

Andrew R. Jassy has served as President and Chief Executive Officer since July 2021 and as a member of the Board of Directors since May 2021.

OWNERSHIP

The Bezos Family Trust owns approximately 9.8% of our outstanding common stock as of December 31, 2023. Jeffrey P. Bezos, as trustee, has voting and investment power over these shares.
